Name: E-GIRL Next Door: Exposed
About the game: E-GIRL Next Door: Exposed is a visual story about a gamer girl Lilly, who decided to switch her prospering gaming career for a life of a full time streamer. As she grew more popular on social media and streaming sites, she is slowly realizing this world is not so innocent as it seems to be! She soon finds out about the dark side of being popular. Play as David, a handsome young man who just moved in right next to Lilly and has no idea what he got himself into! Alex wants to help Lilly with her difficult situation involving a stalker and he is immediately drawn by her charm. Will he manage to break through her walls and reach out to her heart? Or will he become just another fan? The gameplay consists of following the story and making choices along the way, which will influence the events later on. There are multiple endings depending on your actions throughout the game, some of them being quite different from one another! The game features: - Multiple Endings - Realistic Graphics - Flirty Storyline - Full Nude Scenes! - Duration of one play through - 20 - 30 minutes - 100% completion can be done in approx. one hour
